title: Linux tool to show progress for cp, mv, dd
dot: digraph progress_tool{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box];subgraph cluster_intro{label="Progress Tool Overview";style=dashed;tool[label="Progress Tool", shape=ellipse];description[label="Shows progress for cp, mv, dd, etc.\n(Formerly known as cv)", shape=box];tool->description;}subgraph cluster_features{label="Key Features";style=dashed;percentage[label="Displays percentage of copied data", shape=box];estimated_time[label="Shows estimated time", shape=box];throughput[label="Displays throughput", shape=box];monitoring_mode[label="Top-like monitoring mode", shape=box];tool->percentage;tool->estimated_time;tool->throughput;tool->monitoring_mode;}subgraph cluster_installation{label="Installation";style=dashed;debian[label="Debian/Ubuntu: apt install progress", shape=box];arch[label="Arch Linux: pacman -S progress", shape=box];fedora[label="Fedora: dnf install progress", shape=box];macos_brew[label="macOS (Homebrew): brew install progress", shape=box];tool->debian;tool->arch;tool->fedora;tool->macos_brew;}subgraph cluster_usage{label="Usage Examples";style=dashed;monitor[label="Monitor coreutils commands: watch progress -q", shape=box];download[label="Monitor download: watch progress -wc firefox", shape=box];server[label="Monitor web server: progress -c httpd", shape=box];heavy_command[label="Monitor heavy command: cp bigfile newfile & progress -mp $!", shape=box];tool->monitor;tool->download;tool->server;tool->heavy_command;}subgraph cluster_dependencies{label="Dependencies";style=dashed;ncurses[label="Depends on ncurses library", shape=box];tool->ncurses;}subgraph cluster_platforms{label="Supported Platforms";style=dashed;linux[label="Linux", shape=box];freebsd[label="FreeBSD", shape=box];macos[label="macOS", shape=box];tool->linux;tool->freebsd;tool->macos;}tool->cluster_intro;tool->cluster_features;tool->cluster_installation;tool->cluster_usage;tool->cluster_dependencies;tool->cluster_platforms;}
